Tesla Announces Release Date for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2015 Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Announces Release Date for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2015 Financial Results Globe Newswire Jan 25, 2016 &nbsp; PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 01/25/16 -- Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) will post its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2015, after market close on Wednesday, February 10, 2016. At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory release containing a link to the Q4 and Full Year 2015 Shareholder Letter, available on the company website. Tesla management will hold a live question &amp; answer webcast at 2:30pm Pacific Time (5:30pm Eastern Time) to discuss the Company's financial and business results and outlook. What: Date of Tesla Q4 and Full Year 2015 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast When: Wednesday, February 10, 2016 Time: 2:30pm Pacific Time / 5:30pm Eastern Time Shareholder Letter: http://ir.tesla.com Webcast: http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company's website.
